column4: hello. there were problem with 8.10 with nvidia mx 440. that should not be with 8.04, right? what will be if all updates of 8.04 are installed?
do you know how to make that mx 440 working with 8.10? i know only one untried way now : to run .run file from nvidia site.
i tried to turn on "proposed updates" but it has not worked!
have you gone into Hardware Drivers ?
